name: EGG RUNS
description:
This is a 2D Game called EGG RUNS. It has lots of different characters and  functions. The controllers are the side arrow keys and the space bar to jump. There is a secret boss at the end if you get to the castle. The different color blocks can be broken. And to kill a Strawberry hit it on the head, if you don't then you will lose one health. You have 5 health points when you start. From one prize blocks one can get 50 points. And from the coin one cant get 10 points. Also, if one kills a strawberry one would get 10 points. The lava would kill you automatically. But you would respawn. This took a long time to publish. Also, one can get extra lives every time you get to 150 points. Playing time is about 8 minutes. Hope you like it and here are the credits. 

YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyN9RRrCNrHyMNjKfZMDCOw

Background music: https://freesound.org/people/djgriffin/sounds/172561

Boss Music: https://freesound.org/people/Sirkoto51/sounds/443128/

Health Sound Down: https://freesound.org/people/Prof.Mudkip/sounds/386862/

I Got some of the pixel art images from google searches.
